top.title: New US security strategy aligns with Russia's vision, Moscow says
top.summary: The Kremlin welcomes the starkly worded document, which does not cast Russia as a threat to the US.

top.title: Benin coup thwarted by loyalist troops, president tells nation
top.summary: Patrice Talon says the situation is "totally under control" not long after explosions were heard in Cotonou.

top.title: Nightclub fire in India's Goa kills 25 staff and tourists
top.summary: Eyewitnesses described scenes of panic in one of Goa's bustling nightlife areas.

top.title: Trump says $72bn Netflix-Warner Bros deal 'could be a problem'
top.summary: The US president said Netflix's market share "could be a problem" if the planned deal goes ahead.

top.title: Japan is facing a dementia crisis – can technology help?
top.summary: Elderly people aged 65 and over now make up nearly 30% of Japan's population.

top.title: Twitch star QTCinderella says she wishes she never started streaming
top.summary: The Streamer Awards organiser said the negatives of her online role made it hard to enjoy the job.

title.#text: You need to watch the modern horror masterpiece, His House
Netflix CEO made a visit to the White House before buying Warner Bros.
X cuts off the European Commission’s ad account after being fined €120 million
